description:
CricHeroes is the ultimate cricket scoring app to digitally score your local cricket matches, live stream them, and organise tournaments like a professional.
Join millions of passionate cricketers using the #1 Cricket Scorer App to make grassroots cricket world-class!

Live Scoring & Match Analytics:
Broadcast your live cricket scores ball by ball and get an international-grade scorecard — completely FREE!
Enjoy detailed cricket analytics like Wagon Wheel, Manhattan, Worm, Run Rate, MVP, and more.
Let your friends and family follow live scores, commentary, and full scorecards in real time.

Live Streaming & AI Highlights:
Live stream your matches and tournaments just like professional games using only a mobile phone or tools like OBS, VMix, or other broadcast software.
Get automatic AI-generated highlights of your matches after every game.
Relive your best cricket moments and share them instantly with your friends, teammates, and followers.

Your Cricket Profile & Recognition:
Build your world-class cricket profile with in-depth batting and bowling stats — just like the pros!
Earn badges, awards, and leaderboard rankings for your on-field achievements.  Check your and your team’s ranking in city, state, and national leaderboards and celebrate top performers in your area.  CricHeroes Awards – The only global grassroots cricket awards! Perform consistently to win one.

Use CricInsights to analyse performances, track your form, understand your strengths, and improve your game.

Find & Connect with the Cricket Community:
Find cricket teams, opponents, players, umpires, and grounds easily for your next match.
Find Cricketers – Discover players from your contacts and follow their journey. Cheer for them, and celebrate their top performances.
Smart Search – Search players, tournaments, teams, clubs, grounds, and academies using voice search.

For Tournament Organisers:
Run your cricket tournaments professionally and completely FREE with CricHeroes!
Create a beautiful tournament page with leaderboard, points table, schedule, boundary tracker, and live scoring.
Smart Auto-Schedule Generator – Generate tournament fixtures in seconds.  Smart NRR Calculator – Know exactly what your team needs to reach the next stage.

CricHeroes Store:
Buy exclusive CricHeroes-branded cricket apparel and gear at unbeatable prices.  Get premium-quality products trusted by players worldwide.

Cricket Feed & Community:
Stay connected with the world of cricket! Read about rules, education, trivia, quizzes, polls, and stories — all in one place.
Register as a scorer, umpire, or commentator and get more match opportunities in your area.  PRO Club – An exclusive community for CricHeroes PRO users to connect, share, and grow together.

Cricket Associations:
Follow official matches and tournaments of 50+ ICC Associations and 23+ BCCI State Associations.
Track the journey of aspiring cricketers and appreciate grassroots cricket talent.

CricHeroes is built by passionate cricketers, for cricketers and fans around the world.
With 40M+ users, 10M+ matches scored, and a 4.7+ rating, CricHeroes is the No. 1 FREE Cricket Scoring App globally.

Let us know your feedback and suggestions to improve the app. We are just one phone call away at +918141665555.

• Get live NBA score updates, check out the results & view the latest NBA conferences, play-offs & finals.

Live Cricket Scorecard:
• Find all International cricket live score updates, weather reports, pitch analysis, toss stats, player injuries & more.
• Check live cricket scores to be updated on the latest Ranji Trophy matches, Plunkett Shield, Sheffield Shield and IPL
• Avail detailed commentary & info on live IPL cricket matches.

Expert Stats:
• Find out any player's performance with detailed live scorecards. Get in-depth analysis & preview of IPL & T20 cricket matches, including weather, pitch reports & detailed historical statistics.
• Probable playing XI info for cricket research.
• View confirmed playing line-ups and squads for T20 cricket, International Cricket & Football.
• Sports videos and detailed articles with experts picking teams and offering tips for major cricket tournaments like IPL.
Latest Sports Updates & Videos:
• Stay updated with highlights for tournaments in T20 cricket.
• Find all the transfer rumours & new signings from the football world.
• Watch real-time highlights of all key cricketing events.
• Catch exclusive interviews with your favourite players, coaches, and managers.
• Watch all the T20 cricket matches you missed on the highlights tab.
Take the game wherever you go. Download the FanCode app now to enjoy & stay updated!

****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

How to subscribe to F1® TV

F1® TV puts you in the driving seat – with race highlights, live timing and live streaming (available only in certain countries). You can subscribe to F1® TV with an annual or monthly subscription. 

Subscriptions renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours beforehand. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your iTunes account.

With major sporting events lined up, the excitement is in the air! With Dream11, the leading fantasy sports app, you can build your fantasy team and win exciting prizes as the tournaments unfold. Gear up for epic clashes in the Women’s ODI World Cup, IND vs WI Tests and the Australia vs India ODI’s where every game features free contests where you can showcase your skills. 

What is Fantasy Cricket?
Fantasy Cricket is a game of skill where you create your fantasy team of 11 real players. Score points based on on-field performance. Pick your captain and vice captain, and rise up the leaderboard.

Features You’ll Love
Flex Leagues: An all new fantasy format where you decide how the game is played. Make custom leagues with your own rules and play with friends. 
Backups: Now replace unannounced players and always stay prepared for the fantasy cricket or sports game.

Why Choose Dream11?

Don’t just watch cricket—live it with our fantasy sports app. Every run, wicket and boundary becomes more thrilling when you create your fantasy team and compete with millions of passionate fans.

Stumps - The Cricket Scorer is an Easy-To-Use cricket scoring app for all kinds of matches and tournaments. Be a tournament organiser, club cricketer or amateur cricketer, and take your career to the next level by using the Stumps cricket scoring app. It will make you feel like you are no less than an international player.

# It is a digital scoring platform to manage your cricket tournaments with ease like a pro and broadcast your matches online to watch the live score.
# This is the best scoring app which allows you to manage all your organisation's matches and tournaments under a club and gives you the stats of players and teams with a great user interface.
# All the features in the Stumps - The Cricket Scorer are completely FREE.


KEY FEATURES :
# Watch cricket live score with the ball-by-ball update of any match at zero delays.
# Graphical charts - Wagon wheel, Over comparison and Runs comparison.
# Automated voice commentary.
# Scoring can be continued offline even when the network is interrupted.
# Edit and replace any player on the scorecard.
# Share options as an image and pdf.
# Matches Settings - Total wickets, Last man stands, Turn off Wide/No Ball extras, No. of balls per over and more.
# Follow international cricket news.

PLAYERS PROFILE:
# Player Overview - Career statistics, Recent form, Yearly Stats, Best against teams and Awards.
# Statistics are categorised based on the match format.
# Batting Insights and Bowling Insights with charts.
# Add past scores to your profile and build your cricket career.
# One-To-One player comparison
# Filter options include Match Formats, Ball Type, Year-Wise, Original/Added scores.
# Match-Wise Stats helps you to analyze your performance in each of the matches you played.
# Add your Jersey number, Playing role, Batting Style and Bowling Style.
# Share your profile statistics as an image along with your profile link.

TEAMS:
# Team Overview - Win/Loss Ratio, Top Performers, Recent Scores and Wickets taken.
# Role-wise player list (Batters, Bowlers and All-Rounders).
# Assign Captain, Vice-Captain and Wicket-Keeper for your team.
# Team Statistics include Win/Loss percent, Bat First/Second Stats, Toss Stats.
# Team Players Stats - More than 20 stats including MVP.
# Filter options include Match Format, Ball Type, Year-Wise and Player Stats Type.
# Team comparison and Head-To-Head.
# Add social media links of your team.

MATCHES:
# Match Summary, Scorecard, Partnership, Fall Of Wickets, Ball By Ball and many more like international matches.
# Charts like Wagon Wheel, Over Comparison and Runs Comparison
# Super Stars - A real-time rankings of players during matches based on the MVP points system.
# Share match summary and scheduled match as a graphical image along with the match link.
# Custom settings - Total wickets, Last man stands, Turn off Wide/No Ball extras, Number of balls per over, Max 8 balls per over including extras (for junior cricket), Add wide balls to batsman, Add wide runs to batsman, Add no ball extras to batsman
# Export your match as a pdf.

TOURNAMENTS:
# Create and manage your cricket league or tournament.
# Points with the Net Run Rate (NRR) will be updated automatically after each group stage match of the tournament.
# Edit points table to add customized points.
# Statistics of the tournament will be updated automatically.
# Check the points table possibilities for any team to achieve or retain a position in a tournament.
# Share points table as a graphical image with the tournament link.

ORGANISATIONS/CLUBS:
# Manage your cricket tournament and matches under one suite known as Club.
# It is an organisation management feature which can have multiple admins.
# It has unique features like Hall of Fame, Season and Quarterly based statistics of the players.
# Add social media links and website of your organisation or club to attract more visitors to your pages or website.
__

For assistance and queries.
Email: support@stumpsapp.com
Website: stumpsapp.com
